sourcesContent:
import { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { HomeIcon, UsersIcon, WalletIcon, MegaphoneIcon, BellIcon, ClockIcon, ExclamationTriangleIcon, CalendarIcon, MagnifyingGlassIcon, // Changed from SearchIcon ArrowRightOnRectangleIcon } from "@heroicons/react/24/outline"; export default function AdminDashboard() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("User Reports"); const sidebarItems = [ { name: "Dashboard", icon: , path: "/admin-dashboard" }, { name: "User Reports", icon: , path: "/user-reports" }, // Updated path { name: "Wallet Logs", icon: , path: "/wallet-logs" }, // Updated path { name: "Post Announcement", icon: , path: "/announcements" }, // Updated path { name: "Log Out", icon: , path: "/" }, ]; const stats = [ { title: "New Reports Today", value: 12, icon: }, { title: "Active Users Online", value: "2,847", icon: }, { title: "Wallet Requests Pending", value: 34, icon: }, { title: "Flagged Messages", value: 8, icon: }, { title: "Services Listed This Week", value: 156, icon: }, ]; const tabs = ["User Reports", "Dispute Center", "Wallet Logs"]; const reports = [ { id: "#USR-001", name: "John Smith", type: "Inappropriate Content", submittedBy: "Maria Garcia", date: "Jan 15, 2025", status: "Pending", }, { id: "#USR-002", name: "Alex Johnson", type: "Scam/Fraud", submittedBy: "Sarah Wilson", date: "Jan 14, 2025", status: "Resolved", }, ]; return (
{/* Sidebar */}

Admin Dashboard

System Management

{sidebarItems.map((item) => ( ))}
{/* Main Content */}
{/* Header */}

Dashboard Overview

{/* Changed from SearchIcon */}
AS
{/* Stats Grid */}
{stats.map((stat, index) => (
{stat.icon}
+{Math.floor(Math.random() * 30)}%

{stat.title}

{stat.value}

))}
{/* Reports Table */}
{tabs.map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Table Content */} {activeTab === "User Reports" && (
{reports.map((r) => ( ))}
ID Name Type Submitted By Date Status Actions
{r.id} {r.name} {r.type} {r.submittedBy} {r.date} {r.status}
)}
); }
